There was a Dateline NBC airing a few weeks ago which dealt with Benny Hinn.
 
 If you didn't get to see it, additional information can be found at http://www.msnbc.msn.com/id/7090144/ 
 
 There are additional weblinks provided there concerning Hinn and other Televangelists.
 
  Some Audio Tapes that are available on MP3 from: 
 
 http://www.whitehorseinn.org/televangelism.htm 
 
  1.)  Benny Hinn audio track 1: "I am a Little God...I am a little messiah."
 
 http://www.whitehorseinn.org/bennyhinn.mp3
 
  2.)  Paul Crouch of TBN: "I am a Little God...critics be gone!"
 
 http://www.whitehorseinn.org/crouch.mp3
 
  3.)  Kenneth Copeland: "You don't have a God in you...you are one."
 
 http://www.whitehorseinn.org/copeland.mp3
 
 
  For more information, and other audio tapes to listen to, go to 
 
 http://www.whitehorseinn.org/televangelism.htm
 
 
 To see more info on Benny Hinn, Paul Crouch and Kenneth Copeland, go to:
 
 http://www.letusreason.org/Pent37.htm
 
 
  Here's some things from "What's Wrong With The Faith Movement, (Part One)" that may surprise you. 
 
 1.) Paul Crouch : "If you want to criticize Ken Copeland for his preaching on faith, or Dad Hagin, get out of my life! I don't even want to talk to you or hear you. I don't want to see your ugly face. Get out of my face in Jesus name." 68
 
 
 1A.)Also: "Plagiarism, Kenyon and Links to the Word-Faith Movement"
 
 "A few (8) samples of what is called 'plagiarism'...the original works are the rights of KENYON'S GOSPEL PUBLISHING SOCIETY"
 
 "ESSEK WILLIAM KENYON KENNETH E. HAGIN, SR."
 
 http://www.deceptioninthechurch.com/kenyon.htm
 
 
 2.) Benny Hinn also admits to frequenting the graves of both Kathryn Kuhlman and Aimee Semple McPherson to get the "anointing" from their bones. 31
 
 
 3.) On one occasion, Cerullo informed his audience, "You're not looking at Morris Cerullo -- you're looking at God. You're looking at Jesus." 63
 
 
 4.) Claiming that God was directly speaking through him, Cerullo uttered, "Would you surrender your pocketbooks unto me, saith God, and let me be the Lord of your pocketbooks....Yea, so be thou obedient unto my voice." 64
 
 1-4, NOT 1A are at: http://www.equip.org/free/DC755-1.htm
 
 NOTES are at the end of article, "What's Wrong With The Faith Movement, (Part One)
 
 More concerning Benny Hinn, Paul Crouch and others are at:
 
 http://www.equip.org/free/DC755-1.htm

post_info.post_title: Is Benny Hinn A Little God, Or A little messiah?

Little God? little messiah?
 
 Sure. You bet! <sarcasm<
